snippet: Chinese authorities want to crush all petitioners against the state and make those who help them disappear.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Chinese lawyer Xiao Guozhen calls attention to case of Song Ze, man who was arrested for helping petitioners against state, and who subsequently disappeared after helping relative of activist lawyer Chen Guangcheng; contends that Song's case is maddening example of difficulty in China of using rule of law to achieve social justice.
lead_paragraph: Chinese authorities want to crush all petitioners against the state and make those who help them disappear.

headline.seo: In China, Silencing a Voice for Justice
